section.section: The Executive Director shall establish a program in the Governor's Office of Crime Control and Prevention to help victims of domestic violence and their children.

text.section: As a part of the domestic violence program, there shall be, in a major population center of this State, at least 1 program serving the area.

section.section: As funds become available, the Executive Director may extend the domestic violence program to other areas in this State.

Expansion of the domestic violence program may include:
establishing additional shelters; or
providing funds and technical assistance to a local organization or agency that shows that it is able and willing to run a domestic violence program.
